programme.title: The Football Academy
programme.desc: Series following the young boys, girls and para-players at Southampton Academy.

programme.title: The Dengineers
programme.desc: What child doesn't dream of having their very own den? That secret place, only for them; a magical escape from reality. Here to help the children realise their dreams are a group of engineers, expert builders and designers; the dengineers.

programme.title: Opération ouille !
programme.desc: Twin brothers Dr Chris and Dr Xand delve into the scientific worlds of medicine and biology in this education British children's television series. With help from the A&E doctors and patients at Alder Hays Children Hospital, Royal Manchester Children's Hospital and the Liverpool Hospital, these two whacky doctors begin to explain the ins and outs of the emergency departments. The Doctors are also lucky enough to join West Midlands Ambulance Service and Midlands Air Ambulance rapid response teams on the road and in patient's homes as they assist with all kinds of medical emergencies. Combined with fun experiments that viewers can try at home, this educational show is not to be missed.

programme.title: Newsround
programme.desc: News and current affairs programme for children and teens. With details of the day's events, the latest developments and the biggest national and international stories. Newsround looks at the world's main news and provides insight that is aimed at a younger audience. With a special focus on issues affecting young people.

programme.title: Blue Peter
programme.desc: Longest running children's programme in the world, featuring current affairs, competitions, celebrity interviews, popular culture and 'do-it-yourself' instructions on creating arts and crafts trinkets from everyday household items.

programme.title: Mission pôle Nord pôle Sud
programme.desc: Steve Backshall embarks on one of his most challenging adventures yet, as he travels from the Arctic Circle to Antractica on a Pole to Pole journey, documenting a number of deadly creatures along the way. An epic documentary series that showcases the breathtaking landscapes that litter our planet, as well as some of the most remarkable, and deadly, animals that roam land, air and sea. Join Steve on this awesome and astonishing adventure, as he encounters some of our planet's most inhospitable environments, as well as the animals that thrive in these desolate wildernesses.

programme.title: Jill Halfpenny's Easter Journeys
programme.desc: Join actress Jill Halfpenny as she embarks on a journey to explore Easter traditions across the North East region, talking to people who keep the customs and traditions alive. Jill offers a fresh insight into the history and importance Christianity holds in these regions, marking the celebration of the period of the year associated with renewal and rebirth in all its forms. Visit famous historical places of huge religious importance to explore the origins of Easter-related traditions.

programme.title: Le tour du monde des petites bêtes
programme.desc: Petits mais pas moins habiles et ingénieux, certains animaux surprennent par leur taille mais aussi par leurs aptitudes, comme l'hippocampe pygmée ou le tatou nain.

programme.title: Celebrity Best Home Cook
programme.desc: Celebrity Best Home Cook show presented by Claudia Winkleman features 10 famous faces from sport, TV and comedy who compete to impress judges Mary Berry, Angela Hartnett and Chris Bavin. The contestants may be the best in their own sphere, but one thing that interests the judges is if their cooking skills are good enough. The winner will be crowned Celebrity Best Home Cook.

programme.title: Au rythme des saisons
programme.desc: Les contrastes saisonniers posent de grands défis d'adaptation. L'hiver est évidemment la saison qui exige d'être ingénieux et stimule l'inventivité: débusquer les proies que la neige et la glace protègent, faire du froid son allié, trouver et arracher la brindille cachée et nourrissante. La plupart des espèces deviennent plus futées en hiver.

programme.title: Easter from Kings
programme.desc: Easter from Kings presents a remarkable selection of Passiontide and Easter music and readings from the glorious Chapel of King's College, Cambridge. The world-famous choir sing the favourite pieces of choral music telling the story of Jesus's death and resurrection.
